titles.title: To extend the pilot program on partnership agreements to construct new facilities for the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.
To extend the pilot program on partnership agreements to construct new facilities for the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: This bill extends through December 31, 2026, the pilot program under which the Department of Veterans Affairs may accept donations of real property or facilities from specified entities (e.g., a state or local authority).
